heading: UNifayi ubhala ngezinto zikaThixo—Injongo kaNifayi kukuphembelela uluntu ukuba luze kuThixo ka-Abraham luze lusindiswe. Malunga 600–592 P.K.

verses.txt: Kwaye ngoku, mna Nifayi, andiniki mlibo woobawo kule nxalenye yembali yam; ndingenako nangaliphina ixesha ukuyinika nanini na ngokwala macwecwe ndiwabhalayo; kuba sewunikiwe kwimbali egcinwe ngubawo; ngako oko andiyibhali kulo msebenzi.
Kuba kwanele kum ukuthi sisisizukulwana sikaYosefu.

Kwaye akubalulekanga kum ukuba ndicoselele ukunika ingxelo epheleleyo ngazo zonke izinto zikabawo, kuba azinako ukubhalwa kula macwecwe, kuba ndinqwenela indawo yokuba ndikwazi ukubhala ngezinto zikaThixo.
Kuba umnqweno wam ngokupheleleyo kukuba ndithundeze abantu ukuba baze kuThixo ka-Abraham, nakuThixo kaIsake, nakuThixo kaYakobi, ukuze basindiswe.
Ngako oko, andizibhali izinto ezivuyisa ihlabathi, kodwa ezivuyisa uThixo kwakunye nabo abangengabo abehlabathi.
Ngako oko, ndiza kunika umyalelo kwimbewu yam, ukuba ingawazalisi la macwecwe ngezinto ezingenaxabiso kubantwana babantu.
